description: This Java source file defines a Spring Boot REST controller named HelloController, which provides utility endpoints for health checks, documentation redirection, and basic info, primarily for quick checks and utility purposes within the project.

classes.name: HelloController
classes.description: A REST controller providing utility endpoints for health checks, documentation linking, and application info.

methods.name: hello
methods.description: Returns a friendly welcome message at the root endpoint '/'.

methods.name: docs
methods.description: Redirects the user to the Swagger UI documentation at '/swagger-ui.html'.

methods.name: health
methods.description: Provides a simple health check endpoint returning 'OK'.

methods.name: info
methods.description: Returns basic information about the application.
